snippet.title: "Teeth of Naros" DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
The epic world of Reckoning expands. Download the latest adventure to scale the jagged peaks of Naros and unearth the ancient secrets of the Kollossae. 

For more info on the "Teeth of Naros" DLC: http://reckoning.amalur.com/r/dlc/teeth-of-naros

For info on "The Legend of Dead Kel" DLC: http://reckoning.amalur.com/en/r/dlc/dead-kel

Purchase the game: http://reckoning.amalur.com/r/buy

Play the demo: http://reckoning.amalur.com/r/demo

Preview and purchase the soundtrack: http://itunes.apple.com/us/preorder/kingdoms-amalur-reckoning/id494319218
http://www.amazon.com/Kingdoms-Amalur-Reckoning-Soundtrack/dp/B006YBD77C/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1327416548&sr=8-2

http://reckoning.com
http://amalur.com
http://facebook.com/reckoningthegame
http://twitter.com/reckoninggame
